job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Overview</strong></p><p>Software engineer shall support a distributed system providing various Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) features to a diverse customer set. The PaaS system shall support several applications as standalone instances or configured with several supporting components.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Qualifications</strong></p><p>Master's degree in Computer Science or related discipline from an accredited college or university, plus five (5) years of experience as a SWE, in programs and contracts of similar scope, type, and complexity.</p><p>OR</p><p>Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline from an accredited college or university, plus seven (7) years of experience as a SWE, in programs and contracts of similar scope, type, and complexity</p><p>OR</p><p>Nine (9) years of experience as a SWE, in programs and contracts of similar scope, type, and complexity.</p><p>AND</p><p>U.S. Citizenship</p><p>AND</p><p>TS SCI w/FS Poly</p><p><br></p><p><strong>Task Required Skills</strong></p><ul><li>Experience using the Unix command line</li><li>Experience writing scripts using Bash</li><li>Basic understanding of Source Control Systems, specifically Git</li><li>Experience with CI/CD principles and methodologies</li><li>Familiarity with Ruby and the Rails Framework</li><li>Familiarity with Javascript, specifically Node.js</li><li>General SQL database knowledge, preferably Postgres</li><li>Experience with GitLab CI/CD and pipelines</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Task Desired Skills</strong></p><ul><li>Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker</li><li>Experience with container orchestration technologies such as Kubernetes, OpenShift and Helm</li><li>Experience with in-memory data structure stores such as Redis</li><li>Demonstrated domain knowledge in distributed systems (cloud-based technologies)</li><li>Demonstrated understanding of the core software development lifecycle</li></ul>
